author: Bloomberg
title: China Says Its Economy Shrank After Coronavirus Lockdown – for the First Time in Decades
description: China’s economy recorded the first contraction in decades in the first quarter as the coronavirus outbreak shut down large parts of the economy.
content:
China’s economy recorded the first contraction in decades in the first quarter as the coronavirus outbreak shut down large parts of the world’s second-largest economy and dimmed the global outlook.
Gross domestic product shrank 6.8% in the first quarter from… [+2293 chars]
